amendment.description: An amendment to provide funding for Medicaid Services in the amount of $8 million divided as follows: $2.5 million for Guam; $2.5 million for the Virgin Islands; $2 million for American Samoa; and $1 million for the Northern Mariana Islands.

action.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Bordallo amendment (A011). Mr. Regula stated that the Bordallo amendment sought to appropriate funds for an unauthorized program. The Chair sustained the point of order.
